data.name: THE LEGEND OF HEROES: HAJIMARI NO KISEKI - Lapis's Special Costume "The Magic Girl Magical Lapis"
data.detailed_description:
Contains original Magic Girl costume for character Lapis.

Magical Lapis x1

*Open [DLC] under [Item] page in the CAMP menu and select new items to receive them. The applicable characters must be friends in order to use costumes.
*After unlocking costumes, apply them via [Costume] in the CAMP menu.
data.about_the_game:
Contains original Magic Girl costume for character Lapis.

Magical Lapis x1

*Open [DLC] under [Item] page in the CAMP menu and select new items to receive them. The applicable characters must be friends in order to use costumes.
*After unlocking costumes, apply them via [Costume] in the CAMP menu.

  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050

  • Sound Card: Onboard
